name: Germano Kuerten
bio: Full stack web developer, film director, artist of life, and health enthusiast with a vast background in music and film production. Eager to continue creating and collaborating through mediums that inspire people to live a healthier, fuller and more joyful life. Development Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Mongoose, Git and Github. + React, Sass, Python, Django, HTTP, REST, JSON, Heroku, Netlify, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Xd, Figma, Visual Studio Code, Bash, Postman. Other tools: Adobe Premiere, DaVinci Resolve, Ableton Live. General interests: Health, meditation, surfing, essentialism, entrepreneurism, music, cinema, learning new languages, nature, food.
